This vignette serves as a temporary repository of the currently available standard components
inside {mighty.component}.

```{r list-standards, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(mighty.component)

standards <- list_standards() |>
  sort()

for (i in seq_along(standards)) {
  x <- get_standard(standard = standards[[i]])
  x$document()
}
```
